ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (3.5 ounce) package instant French vanilla pudding
2 Granny Smith apples, cored and chopped
2 (2.16 ounce) bars chocolate-coated caramel-peanut nougat candy bars, chopped

cookingTips: Chop candy bars into bite-sized pieces for distribution
Toss apples in lemon juice to prevent browning
Assemble just before serving to maintain fruit texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help prepare and time assembly to prevent fruit oxidation.
